AT.name: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior™
AT.description: Street Fighter II™ setzte in den 1990ern bei Videospielen neue Maßstäbe, indem es das Kampf-Genre revolutionierte. Angesehen als eines der großartigsten Spiele aller Zeiten, war Street Fighter II: The World Warrior der erste Teil der Street Fighter II-Reihe. Wähle zwischen den acht ursprünglichen Kämpfern, darunter Ryu, Chun-Li und Guile. Jeder Charakter verfügt über eine eigene Geschwindigkeit, eigene Fähigkeiten und Spezialtechniken sowie einen individuellen Abspann für ein einzigartiges Spielerlebnis. Wähle deinen Lieblingskämpfer und werde zum Helden! Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior™
AU.description: Street Fighter II™ defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionising the fighting genre. Regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, Street Fighter II: The World Warrior was the first release of the Street Fighter II series; featuring the original eight world warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li and Guile. Each character has his or her own skills, speed, special moves and ending, to make for a truly unique experience. Choose your favourite fighter and become a hero! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior™
BE.description: Street Fighter II™ a marqué l'univers du jeu vidéo dans les années 90 en révolutionnant les règles du jeu de combat. Considéré comme l'un des meilleurs titres de tous les temps, Street Fighter II: The World Warrior est le premier volet de la série Street Fighter II. Vous retrouverez les huit combattants originaux, notamment Ryu, Chun-Li et Guile. Chaque personnage possède ses propres techniques, mouvements spéciaux, vitesse et fin, rendant chaque expérience unique. Choisissez votre combattant favori et devenez un héros ! Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

ES.name: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior™
ES.description: En los 90, Street Fighter II™ revolucionó para siempre los juegos de lucha. Considerado uno de los mejores juegos de todos los tiempos, Street Fighter II: The World Warrior fue el primero de la saga Street Fighter II, donde hicieron su aparición estelar los ocho personajes originales, incluidos Ryu, Chun-Li y Guile. Cada personaje tiene sus propias habilidades, velocidad y movimientos especiales, lo que hace que cada batalla sea única. ¡Elige a tu personaje favorito y pasa a la historia! Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

IT.name: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior™
IT.description: La serie Street Fighter™ II ha rivoluzionato l'intero genere dei picchiaduro negli anni Novanta. In particolare, Street Fighter II: The World Warrior non è solo il primo della serie, ma anche uno dei più bei giochi di tutti i tempi. Divertiti con gli otto combattenti delle origini, tra cui Ryu, Chun-Li e Guile. Ciascun personaggio può vantare le proprie mosse speciali e, grazie ad abilità, velocità e strategie diverse, vivrai un'esperienza di gioco unica. Che aspetti? Scegli il tuo combattente preferito e diventa un eroe! Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

NL.name: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior™
NL.description: Street Fighter II™ definieerde gaming in de jaren 90 door het vechtgenre radicaal te veranderen. Street Fighter II: The World Warrior, dat wordt gezien als een van de beste vechtspellen aller tijde, was het eerste deel in de Street Fighter-reeks en introduceerde de originele cast met onder andere Ryu, Chun-Li en Guile. Elk personage heeft zijn eigen vaardigheden, snelheid, speciale bewegingen en uniek einde. Kies je favoriete vechtersbaas en word een held! Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior™
NZ.description: Street Fighter II™ defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionising the fighting genre. Regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, Street Fighter II: The World Warrior was the first release of the Street Fighter II series; featuring the original eight world warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li and Guile. Each character has his or her own skills, speed, special moves and ending, to make for a truly unique experience. Choose your favourite fighter and become a hero! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior™
PL.description: Street Fighter II™ defined gaming in the 1990s by revolutionising the fighting genre. Regarded as one of the greatest games of all time, Street Fighter II: The World Warrior was the first release of the Street Fighter II series; featuring the original eight world warriors including Ryu, Chun-Li and Guile. Each character has his or her own skills, speed, special moves and ending, to make for a truly unique experience. Choose your favourite fighter and become a hero! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior™
PT.description: Street Fighter II™ marcou os videojogos dos anos 90 ao revolucionar o género de luta. Considerado como um dos melhores jogos de todos os tempos, Street Fighter II: The World Warrior foi o primeiro lançamento da série Street Fighter II, e contava com a presença dos oito lutadores originais, incluindo Ryu, Chun-Li e Guile. Cada personagem tem as suas próprias técnicas, velocidade, movimentos especiais e final, o que contribui para uma experiência verdadeiramente única. Escolhe o teu lutador favorito e torna-te um herói! Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

RU.name: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior™
RU.description: В девяностых годах серия Street Fighter II™ произвела фурор среди поклонников файтинга. Первая игра серии, Street Fighter II: The World Warrior, заслужила статус одной из лучших игр в истории. В поединках вы можете управлять одним из восьми легендарных бойцов, среди которых Ryu, Chun-Li и Guile. Кого бы вы ни выбрали, вам гарантирован уникальный игровой опыт, поскольку умения, скорость, особые приемы и концовка игры у всех персонажей различны. Выясните, чей стиль вам подходит больше, и станьте героем! Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.
